thread.title: Trump Admin Considering Plan To Target Immigrants Receiving Public Assistance
thread.title_full: Trump Admin Considering Plan To Target Immigrants Receiving Public Assistance

author: Esme Cribb
title: Trump Admin Considering Plan To Target Immigrants Receiving Public Assistance
text:
President Donald Trump's administration is considering a plan to deny admission to the United States to immigrants who would likely require public assistance, and set standards for deporting those already in the country who "become a public charge," according to two leaked draft executive orders.
Read More â†’
